Thread hh/390

Csaba Hoch Typos and other errors in documentation [prop, reviewed] <hh/390> <root> (2009-07-12) 
If you find a typo or grammatical mistake in the documentation, please
just fix it, and don't write an email about it, unless you have a
reason to do otherwise. If you would like to explain or discuss the
mistake, that is a reason of course :) But I don't think you should
wait with the fix until we agree on it -- unless you are uncertain
that your correction is right.
Csaba Hoch — <hh/391> <↑hh/390> (2009-07-12)

Seems to be accepted.
